DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to measure the effect of a neurobiologically-guided intensive family based treatment for adults with anorexia nervosa.
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes of a Skill-Based Program for Eating Disorders
DOC.criteria: Current diagnosis of anorexia nervosa Illness onset at least 2 years prior to study Medically stable Identified carer to participate in treatment with participant Developmental or intellectual disorder Diagnosis of substance abuse or dependence in 3 months prior to study Current suicidal thoughts Severe comorbid psychiatric disorder (e.g., psychotic disorder, bipolar disorder)
